item.title: [Python] Try the latest physics-based renderer Mitsuba2 (3) Differentiable rendering
item.description: What is #Mitsuba2 A free physically based renderer for academics. There are new features such as differentiable rendering and polarized rendering. Other related articles I wrote are below. -Try the latest physics-based renderer Mitsuba2 (1) Introduction -Try to touch the latest physics-based renderer Mitsuba2 (2) Move from Python -Try the latest physics-based renderer Mitsuba2 (4) Polarization rendering -Difference between BRDF and polarized BRDF (pBRDF) The assumption is that Mitsuba2 has been installed.
